dialogs.name: fallenDetailFilter
html: Filter by selecting one or more criteria and click Apply.
The website has remembered your Filtered criteria from your previous visit; to cancel these, click Reset.
Location of Memorial or Cemetery (all)

dialogs.name: filter-age
html: Filter by age or ages from the list below, and click Apply.
You need to select at least one age.
Your filter selection results in an empty list, please re-select or close the dialogue.

dialogs.name: filterHelp
html: Use the Filter Form to make browsing the Roll of Honour more specific.
Each of the fallen has nine criteria to filter by: Rank, Age, Regiment, Street, Date of Death, Memorial, Cemetery, Location, Tag. The Filter
Form has a button for each of these, which when clicked will display a list of relevant choices from which you can specify your selection.
For example, to find all the fallen who served in Canadian regiments, click the Regiment button; Clear All; and click the three Canadian
regiments listed; scroll down to the bottom of the list and click the Select button.
You can also filter on multiple criteria. To find all the fallen who served in Canadian regiments and whose names are on the Ypres memorial;
click the Regiment button to select the Canadian regiments; and the memorial button to select the Ypres memorial.
Once you have entered the selection criteria, click the Filter button to return to the detail page, where youll see the names of the fallen
who match your filter criteria; the full details of the first person in the list are also displayed.
To make further changes to your filter criteria click the Filter List button again, your previous filter criteria will still be displayed.
The filter form also has a Reset button to reset the selection criteria to All.
We will continue to update and refine the filter function as the site evolves.
